com.google.android.exoplayer2

Class MediaPeriodInfoSequence.MediaPeriodInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.android.exoplayer2.MediaPeriodInfoSequence.MediaPeriodInfo
  • Enclosing class:
    MediaPeriodInfoSequence

    public static final class MediaPeriodInfoSequence.MediaPeriodInfo
extends java.lang.Object
    Stores the information required to load and play a MediaPeriod.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      long contentPositionUs
      If this is an ad, the position to play in the next content media period.
      long durationUs
      The duration of the media to play within the media period, in microseconds, or C.TIME_UNSET if not known.
      long endPositionUs
      The end position of the media to play within the media period, in microseconds, or C.TIME_END_OF_SOURCE if the end position is the end of the media period.
      MediaSource.MediaPeriodId id
      The media period's identifier.
      boolean isFinal
      Whether this is the last media period in the entire timeline.
      boolean isLastInTimelinePeriod
      Whether this is the last media period in its timeline period (e.g., a postroll ad, or a media period corresponding to a timeline period without ads).
      long startPositionUs
      The start position of the media to play within the media period, in microseconds.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor and Description
      private MediaPeriodInfo(MediaSource.MediaPeriodId id, long startPositionUs, long endPositionUs, long contentPositionUs, long durationUs, boolean isLastInTimelinePeriod, boolean isFinal) 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      MediaPeriodInfoSequence.MediaPeriodInfo copyWithPeriodIndex(int periodIndex)
      Returns a copy of this instance with the period identifier's period index set to the specified value.
      MediaPeriodInfoSequence.MediaPeriodInfo copyWithStartPositionUs(long startPositionUs)
      Returns a copy of this instance with the start position set to the specified value.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • id

        public final MediaSource.MediaPeriodId id
        The media period's identifier.

      • startPositionUs

        public final long startPositionUs
        The start position of the media to play within the media period, in microseconds.

      • endPositionUs

        public final long endPositionUs
        The end position of the media to play within the media period, in microseconds, or C.TIME_END_OF_SOURCE if the end position is the end of the media period.

      • contentPositionUs

        public final long contentPositionUs
        If this is an ad, the position to play in the next content media period. C.TIME_UNSET otherwise.

      • durationUs

        public final long durationUs
        The duration of the media to play within the media period, in microseconds, or C.TIME_UNSET if not known.

      • isLastInTimelinePeriod

        public final boolean isLastInTimelinePeriod
        Whether this is the last media period in its timeline period (e.g., a postroll ad, or a media period corresponding to a timeline period without ads).

      • isFinal

        public final boolean isFinal
        Whether this is the last media period in the entire timeline. If true, isLastInTimelinePeriod will also be true.

    • Constructor Detail

      • MediaPeriodInfo

                        long startPositionUs,

                        long durationUs,

                        boolean isFinal)

        Returns a copy of this instance with the start position set to the specified value.
